description.en: A skin condition caused by clogged hair follicles.
description.id: Kondisi kulit yang terjadi akibat pori-pori tersumbat.

recommendation.en: Maintain skin hygiene and consult a doctor if severe.
recommendation.id: Jaga kebersihan kulit dan konsultasikan ke dokter jika parah.

description.en: A condition causing sudden sensation of spinning due to inner ear problems.
description.id: Kondisi yang menyebabkan sensasi berputar tiba-tiba akibat masalah pada telinga dalam.

recommendation.en: Perform Epley maneuver and consult an ENT specialist.
recommendation.id: Lakukan manuver Epley dan konsultasikan ke dokter THT.

description.en: A chronic, potentially life-threatening condition caused by HIV interfering with the body's ability to fight infection.
description.id: Kondisi kronis yang mengancam jiwa akibat virus HIV yang merusak kemampuan tubuh melawan infeksi.

recommendation.en: Immediate antiretroviral therapy (ART) and specialist care required.
recommendation.id: Segera lakukan terapi antiretroviral (ART) dan perawatan spesialis.

description.en: Liver inflammation caused by drinking too much alcohol.
description.id: Peradangan hati yang disebabkan oleh konsumsi alkohol berlebihan.

recommendation.en: Stop alcohol consumption immediately and seek medical help.
recommendation.id: Hentikan konsumsi alkohol segera dan cari bantuan medis.

description.en: An immune system reaction to a foreign substance usually not harmful to your body.
description.id: Reaksi sistem kekebalan tubuh terhadap zat asing yang biasanya tidak berbahaya.

recommendation.en: Avoid triggers and take antihistamines.
recommendation.id: Hindari pemicu alergi dan minum obat antihistamin.

description.en: Swelling and tenderness of one or more joints.
description.id: Pembengkakan dan nyeri pada satu atau lebih sendi.

recommendation.en: Physical therapy and pain management medication.
recommendation.id: Lakukan fisioterapi dan gunakan obat pereda nyeri.

description.en: A condition in which airways narrow and swell and may produce extra mucus.
description.id: Kondisi di mana saluran napas menyempit, membengkak, dan memproduksi lendir berlebih.

recommendation.en: Use inhalers as prescribed and avoid respiratory triggers.
recommendation.id: Gunakan inhaler sesuai resep dan hindari pemicu pernapasan.

description.en: Age-related wear and tear affecting the spinal disks in your neck.
description.id: Keausan terkait usia yang mempengaruhi cakram tulang belakang di leher.

recommendation.en: Physical therapy, posture correction, and pain relief.
recommendation.id: Fisioterapi, perbaiki postur tubuh, dan pereda nyeri.

description.en: A highly contagious viral infection causing an itchy, blister-like rash.
description.id: Infeksi virus yang sangat menular menyebabkan ruam melepuh dan gatal.

recommendation.en: Use calamine lotion for itching and isolate to prevent spread.
recommendation.id: Gunakan lotion calamine untuk gatal dan isolasi diri untuk mencegah penularan.

description.en: A condition where bile flow from the liver acts slowly or stops completely.
description.id: Kondisi di mana aliran empedu dari hati melambat atau berhenti total.

recommendation.en: Requires medical diagnosis to treat the underlying liver condition.
recommendation.id: Memerlukan diagnosa medis untuk mengobati kondisi hati yang mendasarinya.

description.en: A viral infection of your nose and throat (upper respiratory tract).
description.id: Infeksi virus pada hidung dan tenggorokan (saluran pernapasan atas).

recommendation.en: Rest, hydration, and over-the-counter cold remedies.
recommendation.id: Istirahat cukup, hidrasi, dan obat flu yang dijual bebas.

description.en: A mosquito-borne viral disease occurring in tropical and subtropical areas.
description.id: Penyakit virus yang ditularkan oleh nyamuk, umum terjadi di daerah tropis.

recommendation.en: Monitor platelet count, stay hydrated, and seek hospital care if bleeding occurs.
recommendation.id: Pantau trombosit, jaga hidrasi, dan segera ke RS jika terjadi pendarahan.

description.en: A chronic disease that occurs when the pancreas is no longer able to make insulin.
description.id: Penyakit kronis yang terjadi ketika pankreas tidak lagi mampu memproduksi insulin.

recommendation.en: Control blood sugar through diet, exercise, and insulin/medication.
recommendation.id: Kontrol gula darah melalui diet, olahraga, dan insulin/obat-obatan.

description.en: Swollen veins in your lower rectum.
description.id: Pembengkakan pembuluh darah vena di bagian bawah rektum/anus.

recommendation.en: High-fiber diet, warm baths, and topical treatments.
recommendation.id: Diet tinggi serat, rendam air hangat, dan obat oles.

description.en: An unexpected or dangerous reaction to a drug.
description.id: Reaksi yang tidak diharapkan atau berbahaya terhadap suatu obat.

recommendation.en: Stop taking the medication immediately and consult a doctor.
recommendation.id: Hentikan penggunaan obat segera dan konsultasikan ke dokter.

description.en: A skin disease caused by a fungus (e.g., ringworm).
description.id: Penyakit kulit yang disebabkan oleh jamur (seperti kurap/panu).

recommendation.en: Apply antifungal cream and keep the area dry.
recommendation.id: Oleskan krim antijamur dan jaga area tetap kering.

description.en: Digestive disease in which stomach acid or bile irritates the food pipe lining.
description.id: Penyakit pencernaan di mana asam lambung mengiritasi lapisan kerongkongan.

recommendation.en: Avoid spicy foods, do not lie down after eating, and take antacids.
recommendation.id: Hindari makanan pedas, jangan berbaring setelah makan, dan minum antasida.

description.en: An intestinal infection marked by watery diarrhea, abdominal cramps, nausea or vomiting.
description.id: Infeksi usus yang ditandai dengan diare cair, kram perut, mual, atau muntah.

recommendation.en: Stay hydrated with oral rehydration salts (ORS) and rest.
recommendation.id: Jaga hidrasi dengan oralit dan istirahat yang cukup.

description.en: A blockage of blood flow to the heart muscle.
description.id: Penyumbatan aliran darah ke otot jantung.

recommendation.en: Medical Emergency! Call an ambulance immediately.
recommendation.id: Gawat Darurat! Panggil ambulans atau segera ke IGD.

description.en: A serious liver infection caused by the hepatitis B virus (HBV).
description.id: Infeksi hati serius yang disebabkan oleh virus hepatitis B (HBV).

recommendation.en: Antiviral medications and regular liver monitoring.
recommendation.id: Obat antivirus dan pemantauan fungsi hati secara rutin.

description.en: A viral infection that causes liver inflammation, sometimes leading to serious liver damage.
description.id: Infeksi virus yang menyebabkan peradangan hati, terkadang memicu kerusakan hati serius.

recommendation.en: Consult a specialist for antiviral therapy (DAA).
recommendation.id: Konsultasikan ke spesialis untuk terapi antivirus (DAA).

description.en: A serious liver disease caused by the hepatitis D virus (HDV), only occurs in people infected with Hepatitis B.
description.id: Penyakit hati serius akibat virus HDV, hanya terjadi pada orang yang sudah terinfeksi Hepatitis B.

recommendation.en: Supportive care and management of Hepatitis B co-infection.
recommendation.id: Perawatan suportif dan pengelolaan koinfeksi Hepatitis B.

description.en: A liver disease caused by the hepatitis E virus, usually transmitted via contaminated water.
description.id: Penyakit hati akibat virus hepatitis E, biasanya menular melalui air yang terkontaminasi.

recommendation.en: Rest, adequate nutrition and fluids; avoid alcohol and toxic substances.
recommendation.id: Istirahat, cukup nutrisi dan cairan; hindari alkohol dan zat toksik.

description.en: A condition in which the force of the blood against the artery walls is too high.
description.id: Kondisi di mana tekanan darah terhadap dinding arteri terlalu tinggi.

recommendation.en: Reduce salt intake, exercise regularly, and take prescribed medication.
recommendation.id: Kurangi garam, olahraga teratur, dan minum obat sesuai resep.

description.en: The overproduction of a hormone by the butterfly-shaped gland in the neck (thyroid).
description.id: Produksi berlebih hormon oleh kelenjar berbentuk kupu-kupu di leher (tiroid).

recommendation.en: Treatment involves anti-thyroid medications or radioactive iodine.
recommendation.id: Pengobatan melibatkan obat anti-tiroid atau yodium radioaktif.

description.en: Low blood sugar level, the body's main energy source.
description.id: Kadar gula darah rendah, padahal gula adalah sumber energi utama tubuh.

recommendation.en: Consume fast-acting carbohydrates (sugar, juice) immediately.
recommendation.id: Segera konsumsi karbohidrat cepat serap (gula, jus, permen).

description.en: A condition in which the thyroid gland doesn't produce enough thyroid hormone.
description.id: Kondisi di mana kelenjar tiroid tidak memproduksi cukup hormon tiroid.

recommendation.en: Daily use of synthetic thyroid hormone levothyroxine.
recommendation.id: Penggunaan hormon tiroid sintetik levothyroxine setiap hari.

description.en: A highly contagious skin infection that mainly affects infants and children.
description.id: Infeksi kulit yang sangat menular, terutama menyerang bayi dan anak-anak.

recommendation.en: Antibiotic ointment or oral antibiotics; keep sores covered.
recommendation.id: Salep antibiotik atau antibiotik minum; tutup luka agar tidak menular.

description.en: Yellowing of the skin and eyes caused by high levels of bilirubin.
description.id: Warna kuning pada kulit dan mata akibat tingginya kadar bilirubin.

recommendation.en: Treat the underlying cause (liver/gallbladder issue) immediately.
recommendation.id: Segera obati penyebab dasarnya (masalah hati/empedu).

description.en: A disease caused by a plasmodium parasite, transmitted by the bite of infected mosquitoes.
description.id: Penyakit akibat parasit plasmodium yang ditularkan melalui gigitan nyamuk terinfeksi.

recommendation.en: Prescription antimalarial drugs; prevention using mosquito nets.
recommendation.id: Obat antimalaria resep dokter; pencegahan menggunakan kelambu.

description.en: A headache of varying intensity, often accompanied by nausea and sensitivity to light.
description.id: Sakit kepala dengan intensitas bervariasi, sering disertai mual dan sensitif cahaya.

recommendation.en: Rest in a quiet, dark room; pain relievers or triptans.
recommendation.id: Istirahat di ruangan gelap dan tenang; minum pereda nyeri.

description.en: A type of arthritis that occurs when flexible tissue at the ends of bones wears down.
description.id: Jenis radang sendi yang terjadi ketika bantalan tulang rawan di ujung tulang menipis.

recommendation.en: Weight management, exercise, and pain relief medication.
recommendation.id: Jaga berat badan, olahraga ringan, dan obat pereda nyeri.

description.en: Loss of muscle function caused by bleeding in the brain.
description.id: Hilangnya fungsi otot akibat pendarahan di dalam otak.

recommendation.en: Critical Emergency! Immediate hospitalization and neurosurgical evaluation.
recommendation.id: Gawat Darurat Kritis! Segera bawa ke RS untuk evaluasi bedah saraf.

description.en: Open sores that develop on the inside lining of your stomach and the upper portion of your small intestine.
description.id: Luka terbuka yang terbentuk di lapisan dalam lambung dan bagian atas usus kecil.

recommendation.en: Avoid NSAIDs, alcohol, and spicy foods; antibiotics if H. pylori infection is present.
recommendation.id: Hindari obat pereda nyeri (NSAID), alkohol, dan pedas; antibiotik jika ada infeksi bakteri H. pylori.

description.en: Infection that inflames air sacs in one or both lungs, which may fill with fluid.
description.id: Infeksi yang menyebabkan peradangan pada kantung udara di paru-paru, yang bisa terisi cairan/nanah.

recommendation.en: Antibiotics (if bacterial), antivirals (if viral), rest, and fluids.
recommendation.id: Antibiotik (jika bakteri), antivirus (jika virus), istirahat total, dan banyak minum.

description.en: A skin disease that causes a rash with itchy, scaly patches, most commonly on the knees, elbows, trunk and scalp.
description.id: Penyakit kulit autoimun yang menyebabkan ruam bersisik dan gatal, sering di lutut, siku, dan kulit kepala.

recommendation.en: Topical corticosteroids, light therapy, and moisturizers.
recommendation.id: Kortikosteroid oles, terapi cahaya, dan pelembap.

description.en: A potentially serious infectious bacterial disease that mainly affects the lungs.
description.id: Penyakit infeksi bakteri serius yang terutama menyerang paru-paru.

recommendation.en: Strict adherence to a long-term antibiotic course (6-9 months).
recommendation.id: Patuhi pengobatan antibiotik jangka panjang (6-9 bulan) tanpa putus.

description.en: A bacterial infection that can lead to a high fever, diarrhea, and vomiting.
description.id: Infeksi bakteri Salmonella typhi yang menyebabkan demam tinggi, diare, dan masalah pencernaan.

recommendation.en: Antibiotics, fluids for hydration, and careful diet.
recommendation.id: Antibiotik, cairan untuk hidrasi, dan diet makanan lunak.

description.en: An infection in any part of your urinary system — your kidneys, bladder, or urethra.
description.id: Infeksi di bagian mana pun dari sistem kemih — ginjal, kandung kemih, atau uretra.

recommendation.en: Antibiotics and increased water intake.
recommendation.id: Antibiotik dan perbanyak minum air putih.

description.en: Gnarled, enlarged veins, most commonly appearing in the legs and feet.
description.id: Pembuluh darah vena yang membesar dan berkelok-kelok, biasanya di kaki.

recommendation.en: Compression stockings, exercise, and elevating legs.
recommendation.id: Gunakan stoking kompresi, olahraga, dan angkat kaki saat berbaring.

description.en: A highly contagious liver infection caused by the hepatitis A virus.
description.id: Infeksi hati yang sangat menular akibat virus hepatitis A (biasanya dari makanan/air).

recommendation.en: Rest and hydration; the body usually clears the virus on its own.
recommendation.id: Istirahat dan hidrasi; tubuh biasanya membersihkan virus dengan sendirinya.
